title: Jiaonang Jihua
synopsis:
The "Capsules Project" invites professional teams from various industries with mature animation production experience to create short films ranging from 5 to 15 minutes, themed around "Extreme Emotions." Teams will choose two of seven emotion capsules—"Thorn," "Desire," "Joy," "Illusion," "Numbness," "Tears," and "Passion"—and, based on their effects, create a collection of high-quality animated short films in different formats and styles. Through diverse forms and styles, the project aims to convey a variety of emotional stories and, together with Chinese animators, propel them onto the world stage.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
